title: {Custom Type} PARIS Rotational Ambigram
content:
Here is the latest addition to my portfolio, from concept to completion in one night (last night), a PARIS rotational ambigram. HiRes PDF attached for closer inspection.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023083052im_/http:/typophile.com/files/paris_3729.gif)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [PARIS.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023083052/http:/typophile.com/files/PARIS_0.pdf) | 53.91 KB |
author: dave bailey

comments.content: This is stunning. I wish it was big enough to set as my desktop background.
I don't think the attached came through?
Thanks! I added the PDF attachment, not sure what happened there!
This is really beautiful work. Love it, thanks for sharing!
